the story of a real life Y/N; 
yes, you read that right. i was sent to the hospital because of this ATROCIOUS app. i will NEVER be getting this app again and WILL NEVER be voting red. i am absolutely TRAUMATIZED!!! i have ptsd ğŸ˜¡â¤ï¸ let me lay the story out for you, shall i? it was misty tuesday morning, leaves blowing, chickens cocka-doodle-doodling, and my brunette hair was up in a messy bun. my bright blue orbs opened wide as i had a thought. â€˜why not download this app?â€™ WORST MISTAKE OF MY LIFE!! just minutes after downloading the app, i noticed a sharp pain in my left eye socket. naturally, i screamed and my ab*sive mother ran down the stairs (this story takes place prior to selling me to one direction btwğŸ™ˆ) and she brought me to the hospital. the doctors took SPOONS and spooned out my eyeballs. i now have no eyeballs. therefore i am blind. anyway go donate to my gofundme so i can get some new eyeballs â¤ï¸

attributes.review: String theory, in particle physics, a theory that attempts to merge quantum mechanicswith Albert Einsteinâ€™s general theory of relativity. The name string theory comes from the modeling of subatomic particles as tiny one-dimensional â€œstringlikeâ€ entities rather than the more conventional approach in which they are modeled as zero-dimensional point particles. The theory envisions that a stringundergoing a particular mode of vibration corresponds to a particle with definite properties such as mass and charge. In the 1980s, physicists realized that string theory had the potential to incorporate all four of natureâ€™s forcesâ€”gravity, electromagnetism, strong force, and weak forceâ€”and all types of matter in a single quantum mechanical framework, suggesting that it might be the long-sought unified field theory. While string theory is still a vibrant area of research that is undergoing rapid development, it remains primarily a mathematical construct because it has yet to make contact with experimental observations.
